p: Several review papers from the last decade present other activities of S. hortensis natural products such as antiviral properties (evaluated against HIV virus) [ 6, 64, 65], inhibitory effects of methanol extracts on adhesion of the activated human platelet to laminin-coated plates [ 3, 30], antispasmodic and diuretic [ 27], anti-asthenic, anti-dysenteric, bronchidilatator and carminative [ 66], expectorant [ 67], emmenagogue, aphrodisiac and resolutive [ 68] or for stomach pain [ 69].
